config.py.docstring: Game configuration and command line argument parsing

classes.name: GameConfig
classes.docstring: Handles game configuration and command line argument parsing

methods.name: _save_config_if_requested
methods.docstring: Save current configuration to file if requested

methods.name: _update_config_from_current_settings
methods.docstring: Update config file with current game settings

methods.name: _get_config_value
methods.docstring: Get value from config file with fallback to default

config_file.py.docstring:
Game configuration file management
Supports JSON and INI configuration files for persistent settings

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize configuration file manager

Args:
    config_path: Path to configuration file (defaults to game.conf)

methods.name: load
methods.docstring:
Load configuration from file

Returns:
    True if loaded successfully, False otherwise

methods.name: save
methods.docstring:
Save configuration to file

Returns:
    True if saved successfully, False otherwise

methods.name: _convert_value
methods.docstring: Convert string value to appropriate type

methods.name: get
methods.docstring:
Get configuration value

Args:
    key: Configuration key
    default: Default value if not found
    section: Section name for INI format
    
Returns:
    Configuration value or default

methods.name: set
methods.docstring:
Set configuration value

Args:
    key: Configuration key
    value: Value to set
    section: Section name for INI format

methods.name: has
methods.docstring:
Check if configuration key exists

Args:
    key: Configuration key
    section: Section name for INI format
    
Returns:
    True if key exists, False otherwise

methods.name: delete
methods.docstring:
Delete configuration key

Args:
    key: Configuration key
    section: Section name for INI format
    
Returns:
    True if deleted, False if not found

methods.name: get_all_keys
methods.docstring:
Get all configuration keys

Args:
    section: Section name for INI format
    
Returns:
    List of all keys

methods.name: _get_nested_keys
methods.docstring: Get all nested keys from dictionary

methods.name: export_to_args
methods.docstring:
Export configuration as command line arguments

Args:
    prefix: Argument prefix (e.g., "--")
    
Returns:
    List of command line arguments

methods.name: merge_from_args
methods.docstring:
Merge configuration from arguments dictionary

Args:
    args_dict: Dictionary of arguments to merge

debug.py.docstring: Enhanced debug overlay and developer tools

classes.name: DebugOverlay
classes.docstring: Enhanced debug overlay showing game state and performance

methods.name: toggle_panel
methods.docstring: Toggle visibility of a debug panel

methods.name: _render_fps_counter
methods.docstring: Render FPS counter in top-right corner

methods.name: load_from_file
methods.docstring:
Load entities from a JSON file. If level is provided, ensure entities are placed on the map:
- If the target tile is '.', place the entity there (set map char to 'E').
- Otherwise try to find the nearest '.' and place entity there; if none found, skip the entity.

methods.name: update
methods.docstring: Update movable entities (currently only Enemy). Returns events list.

classes.name: FloorManager
classes.docstring: Manages floor generation, transitions, and state

methods.name: generate_initial_level
methods.docstring: Generate the initial level based on configuration

methods.name: setup_level
methods.docstring: Setup a level with entities and NPCs

methods.name: process_floor_transition
methods.docstring: Process a floor transition if ready. Returns (level, entity_mgr, npcs) or (None, None, None)

methods.name: _write_floor_snapshots
methods.docstring: Write debug snapshots for the floor

methods.name: write_initial_snapshot
methods.docstring: Write snapshot for the initial floor

game.py.docstring: Main game class that orchestrates all game systems

classes.name: Game
classes.docstring: Main game class that manages the game loop and systems

methods.name: _initialize_game_world
methods.docstring: Initialize the game world (level, player, etc.)

methods.name: _setup_initial_level
methods.docstring: Setup the initial level with entities and NPCs

methods.name: run
methods.docstring: Main game loop with enhanced monitoring and error handling

methods.name: _handle_movement_result
methods.docstring: Handle the result of player movement

methods.name: handle_events
methods.docstring: Handle pygame events and return action results

methods.name: handle_continuous_input
methods.docstring: Handle continuous key states (movement, sprint, tab)

logging.py.docstring: Enhanced logging and error handling utilities

classes.name: Logger
classes.docstring: Enhanced logging system for the game

methods.name: error
methods.docstring: Log error message with optional exception

methods.name: get_performance_stats
methods.docstring: Get performance statistics for an operation

methods.name: handle_exception
methods.docstring:
Handle an exception with logging and recovery logic
Returns True if the operation should be retried, False if it should be skipped

methods.name: safe_call
methods.docstring: Safely call a function with error handling

classes.name: PerformanceMonitor
classes.docstring: Real-time performance monitoring and data collection

methods.name: start_frame
methods.docstring: Mark the start of a frame

methods.name: end_frame
methods.docstring: Mark the end of a frame

methods.name: log_performance_summary
methods.docstring: Log a summary of performance statistics

methods.name: check_performance_issues
methods.docstring: Analyze performance data and return list of issues

methods.name: _cleanup_font_cache
methods.docstring: Remove oldest items from font cache

methods.name: suggest_optimizations
methods.docstring: Suggest specific optimizations based on performance data

classes.name: CacheManager
classes.docstring: Manages various game caches for performance

methods.name: get_cached_surface
methods.docstring: Get cached surface or generate and cache it

methods.name: _cleanup_cache
methods.docstring: Remove least recently used items from cache

methods.name: update_view_size
methods.docstring: Update view size when level changes

methods.name: _get_tile_color
methods.docstring: Get the color for a tile character

methods.name: _render_debug_logs
methods.docstring: Render debug logs in the corner

methods.name: set_level
methods.docstring: Set the current level and update dimensions

methods.name: compute_exit_pos
methods.docstring: Find the exit position in the current level

methods.name: start_floor_transition
methods.docstring: Start a floor transition with given parameters

methods.name: update_floor_transition
methods.docstring: Update floor transition timer. Returns True if transition completed.

methods.name: complete_floor_transition
methods.docstring: Complete the floor transition and clean up state

methods.name: write_exit_log
methods.docstring: Write to the persistent exit log

methods.name: update_camera
methods.docstring: Update camera position with smooth following

functions.name: draw_player_hud
functions.docstring:
Draw a small HUD showing HP and stamina bar at top-right.
player: Player instance with hp, stamina, max_stamina, sprint_cooldown
ox, oy: shake offsets
view_px_w: width of viewport (for positioning)

functions.name: draw_target_indicator
functions.docstring:
Draw an arrow indicator pointing to target_pos (tile coords in pixels).
If target on-screen, draw a small marker; otherwise clamp to edge and draw arrow.
target_pos: (wx_px, wy_px)

functions.name: draw_sprint_particles
functions.docstring:
Render player's sprint_particles list. world_to_screen converts world px -> screen px.
font: pygame Font used to render particle glyphs.

functions.name: load_preferred_font
functions.docstring: Scan fonts/ and system fonts and return a pygame Font instance plus the path used (or None).
